timeline.author: uarlouski

timeline.bodyText: does it make sense to introduce it through interface in case if we want to add adobe analytics or smith else?
timeline.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText: most likely the API will require significant rework to make it applicable on 2 and more analytics systems, so I don't recommend to do it now
replies.author: valfirst

timeline.bodyText: move all strings like "v" to readable constants: String VERSION = "v" ?

uarlouski

timeline.bodyText: just interesting why is it needed?
timeline.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText:
It looks like analytics is missing some events with our User-Agent
It is used to calculate statistics we are no interested in;
replies.author: ikalinin1

replies.bodyText: Just in case we could send User-Agent via Measurement Protocol and it will be used to calculate what browser is used, but we track profiles not the browsers;
replies.author: ikalinin1
